verbs.description: President Trump and French President Macron [V: have] ceremonially planted a tree together on the South Lawn of the White House as they kick off the first state visit of the Trump presidency . ( April 23 )

[ARG0: President Trump and French President Macron] have [ARGM-MNR: ceremonially] [V: planted] [ARG1: a tree] [ARGM-MNR: together] [ARGM-LOC: on the South Lawn of the White House] [ARGM-TMP: as they kick off the first state visit of the Trump presidency] . ( April 23 )

President Trump and French President Macron have ceremonially planted a tree together on the South Lawn of the White House as [ARG0: they] [V: kick] off [ARG1: the first state visit of the Trump presidency] . ( April 23 )
